read.csv() do pacote base
```{r}
tempo_base_r <- system.time({
  df_base_r <- read.csv("~/archive/flights.csv")
})
tempo_base_r
```

read_csv() do pacote readr
```{r}
library(readr)
tempo_readr <- system.time({
  df_readr <- read_csv("~/archive/flights.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
})
print(tempo_readr)
```

read_csv() do pandas
```{python}
#library(reticulate)
#py_install("pandas")
import time
import pandas as pd
inicio = time.time()
df_pandas = pd.read_csv("~/archive/flights.csv")
fim = time.time()
tempo_pandas = fim - inicio
```
